item.title: Live updates: Airspace reopens in Israel after Iran ceasefire; Atomic agency detects 'localized' radioactive leaks
item.description: A ceasefire agreed to by Israel and Iran appears to be holding after it was announced by President Donald Trump.

item.title: 'Fire up the deportation planes': Trump official praises Supreme Court ruling

item.title: Trump says he's 'not happy' as Israel and Iran both claim ceasefire violations
